backend/main.mo: Motoko backend canister defining data types and CRUD logic for profiles, jobs, applications, posts, and messages with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing recent admin error‑handling improvements and listing affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, mainly pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/.env: Development environment file defining the logo asset URL.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment file defining the logo asset URL.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and injecting the logo URL as favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the full TanStack Router tree for landing, onboarding, dashboard, job pages, and admin routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: Admin password entry component showing logo, error messages, and calling onUnlock to verify admin access.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown to unauthorized users with logo, warning icon, and a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Logo component rendering a circular image using the resolved LOGO_URL with size presets.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminMutat: Provides React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting job vacancies and posts with admin error handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useApplicatio: Defines queries for fetching user applications and a mutation for applying to jobs with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthorized: Performs an admin-protected user search with basic unauthorized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerRole: Fetches the caller’s user role via a simple React Query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerUser: Manages fetching and saving the caller’s user profile with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useJobs.ts: Provides queries for listing, searching, and fetching individual job vacancies.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMessages.t: Implements inbox and sent‑messages queries plus a send‑message mutation with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: Fetches all posts for display using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, auto‑invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPassword.ts: Tracks admin unlock state, validates admin privileges, and handles session locking and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication, login handling, and identity persistence through context.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React Query, identity provider, and rendering the root app.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout with password gating, navigation tabs, and a container for admin subpages.
Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete posts with optional image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/VacanciesAdminP: Admin page for managing job vacancies including creating, editing, and deleting listings.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/BrowseJobsP: Job browsing page with search, job listing display, and navigation to job detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardLa: Dashboard shell that checks identity and profile, provides navigation tabs, and renders the layout with logout and user info.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JobDetailPa: Displays job details, handles file upload, and submits job applications with cover letter and resume.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MessagesPag: Shows inbox and sent messages, allows admins to search users and send messages.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MyApplicati: Lists the user's job applications with status, dates, and resume links.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ProfilePage: User profile form enabling editing personal info and uploading a resume.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/UpdatesPage: Displays announcement posts with dates, images, and content.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that handles authentication redirects and displays marketing, contact info, and feature sections.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: User onboarding form that saves profile data and optionally uploads a resume.
Formats admin-related errors, detecting stopped-canister and authorization issues and returning structured user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/logoAsset.ts: Provides a centralized logo URL with cache-busting, using an environment variable with a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing and persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, known issues, and requirements related to handling stopped backend canister errors.
